dict.string: Increases the critical chance of spells by 10%
Reduces Cast Times and Cooldowns by 10%.
Your heals reduce their target's damage taken by 7.5% for 10 seconds.
Non-periodic healing shields the target for 10% of the healing done.
Your heals increase the target's damage dealt by 25% for 10 seconds.
50% of Overhealing is distributed to injured allies.
Spell critical hits decrease your next 2 spell casts by 50% and reduce spell cooldowns by 10%.
Your healing spells increase the maximum health of the target by 10% for 1 minute.
Your healing spells increase the dodge chance of the target by 10% for 1 minute.
Your healing spells increase the healing received of the target by 10% for 1 minute.
Each second you grant a small amount of shielding to all allies.
If an ally would die instead you instantly heal that ally for a small amount. This can not occur more than once every 30 seconds.
All healing done has a 3% chance to summon an Avatar that heals allies for 15 seconds.
